name: The War of Art
writer: Matt Groening (created by), James L. Brooks (developed by), Matt Groening (developed by), Sam Simon (developed by), Rob LaZebnik
actors: Dan Castellaneta, Julie Kavner, Nancy Cartwright, Yeardley Smith
plot: The friendship between the Simpsons and the Van Houtens is challenged when a painting the Simpsons buy from the Van Houtens' yard sale is discovered to be extremely valuable.
